text: The Peugeot 5008 is a SUV produced by Peugeot since 2009. While in its first generation, it was a MPV version of the Peugeot 3008, but the second generation turned to a SUV. It is a longer seven-seater version of the Peugeot 3008. == Engines == * 1.6 VTi 88 kW (120 hp) * 1.6 THP 115 kW (156 hp) * 1.6 HDi 80 kW (109 hp) and 82 kW (112 hp) * 2.0 HDi 110 kW (150 hp) and 120 kW (163 hp) 5008 Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Peugeot 5008
